preferences.main_subtitle_text: A friendly reminder from the Houzz IT Team
preferences.paragraph1_text:
Your Houzz issued device requires a fully up-to-date operating system to ensure that IT can accurately protect your device.

As soon as you are able, please save and back up your work and install updates.

If you have any questions, submit a ticket at https://toolbox.houzz.com/support/home.
preferences.paragraph2_text: Updates can take around an hour to complete.
preferences.paragraph3_text: To begin the update, simply click on the button below and follow the provided steps. This update requires your device to restart
preferences.paragraph_title_text: Action Required - Your device requires a security update.
